citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 10:35 am to
11:05 am on 30-NOV-17.
During that time, the inspector waited at the facility and called available phone numbers on file and was informed by
a family member that they were away from the facility today.

narrative:
